item.title: 威尔士王妃凯特周五表示，她患有癌症，正在接受化疗。自上个月国王查尔斯三世宣布正在接受一种不明类型的癌症治疗以来，这一消息再次令王室成员感到震惊。
item.description:
Kate, the Princess of Wales, said Friday she has cancer and is undergoing chemotherapy.

The news is another shock for the royal family since the announcement last month that King Charles III was being treated for an unspecified type of cancer. https://t.co/XnSEYEIWBu pic.twitter.com/xto7oZvljt

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 威尔士王妃凯特周五表示，她患有癌症，正在接受化疗。自今年 1 月凯特王妃因不明原因的腹部手术住院以来，社交媒体上关于她的行踪和健康状况的猜测已经持续了数周。
item.description:
Kate, the Princess of Wales, said Friday she has cancer and is undergoing chemotherapy. The video announcement came after weeks of speculation spread on social media about her whereabouts and health since she was hospitalized in January for unspecified abdominal surgery. pic.twitter.com/avEJxHJ8IR

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：威尔士王妃凯特说她得了癌症，正在接受化疗。自今年 1 月凯特王妃因不明原因的腹部手术住院以来，人们对她的行踪和健康状况进行了数周的猜测。
item.description:
BREAKING: Kate, the Princess of Wales, says she has cancer and is undergoing chemotherapy. The video announcement came after weeks of speculation about her whereabouts and health since she was hospitalized in January for unspecified abdominal surgery. https://t.co/RQjVVOteAx
